items.title: The Neowsletter - February 2026
items.summary: Mega Crit's February Neowsletter teases Slay the Spire 2's March Early Access launch and reminds players to finish pre-release goals.

items.title: The Neowsletter - January 2026
items.summary: January Neowsletter marks Slay the Spire's anniversary and reflects on the series' development ahead of the sequel.

items.title: Slay the Spire 2 Releases in Early Access on March 5, 2026!
items.summary: Steam announcement confirms Slay the Spire 2 arrives in Early Access on March 5, 2026 and links the official trailer and wishlist.

items.title: The Neowsletter - July 2025
items.summary: July Neowsletter previews Colorless Cards and offers an update from Mega Crit on development progress.

items.title: The Neowsletter - October 2025
items.summary: October Neowsletter addresses the game's delay and offers a seasonal update on Slay the Spire 2's progress.

items.title: The Neowsletter - May 2025
items.summary: May Neowsletter reiterates Mega Crit's commitment to quality for the Early Access launch.

items.title: The Neowsletter - August 2025
items.summary: August Neowsletter celebrates The Neowsletter's anniversary and shares a development update on the sequel.

items.title: The Neowsletter - November 2025
items.summary: November Neowsletter offers a new content sneak peek for Slay the Spire 2 and introduces a playable character.

items.title: The Neowsletter - June 2025
items.summary: June Neowsletter shares gameplay notes and development updates following Mega Crit's Summer plans.

items.title: The Neowsletter - September 2025
items.summary: September Neowsletter announces an updated Early Access timeline and explains the decision to move the launch window.

items.title: Release Date Trailer
items.summary: Mega Crit published the official release-date trailer for Slay the Spire 2.

items.title: Just Announced Slay The Spire 2 Copy
items.summary: Mega Crit's original Slay the Spire 2 announcement post.

items.title: Youtooz X Slay The Spire Limited Edition Figures Out Now
items.summary: Mega Crit posted about the Youtooz Slay the Spire limited-edition figures release.

item.title: Release Date Trailer
item.summary: Mega Crit published the official release-date trailer for Slay the Spire 2.
